text: Does the child respond when called by name?
Can the child point to body parts when asked?
Is the child able to use a spoon independently?
milestone_id: able to hold spoon with fingers appropriately

text: Does the child make eye contact with you?
Does the child respond to simple commands like 'come here'?
Can the child walk up stairs with assistance?
Does the child show interest in other children?
Can the child build a tower of blocks?
Does the child try to comfort others who are upset?
Can the child say at least 10 words?
